teaching_tip: Place tongue close to upper teeth and blow air gently
Press lips together and hum - you can feel vibration
Touch tongue tip to roof of mouth then release quickly
Touch tongue to roof and hum - like /m/ but with tongue
Press lips together then release with small puff of air
Back of tongue touches soft palate then releases
Breathe out gently with open mouth - like fogging a mirror
Curl tongue back slightly - don't touch roof of mouth
Like /t/ but with voice - feel throat vibration
Like /p/ but with voice - feel lips vibrate
Small smile with relaxed tongue - shorter than 'ee'
Open mouth wide like at the doctor - tongue low and front
Medium mouth opening - tongue in middle position
Relaxed mouth - tongue in center, not too high or low
Round lips slightly with open mouth
Bite lower lip gently with upper teeth and blow
Like /f/ but with voice - feel lip vibration
Touch tongue tip to roof and let air flow around sides
Like /k/ but with voice - feel throat vibration
Round lips like 'oo' then glide to next sound
Tongue high and forward - like start of 'ee' sound
Like /s/ but with voice - feel throat buzz
Round lips slightly and pull tongue back from /s/ position
Combine /t/ and /ʃ/ quickly - like a sneeze sound
Like /tʃ/ but with voice - feel vibration
Stick tongue tip between teeth and blow gently
Like /θ/ but with voice - tongue between teeth
Back of tongue touches soft palate while humming
Like /ʃ/ but with voice - feel throat vibration
